page.title: 14SHOPS
page.content: {SHOPS}are few in our block.B&Q have a Do it Youself store on Hamilton Road with extensive parking space. It also has a garden centre.We have a number of large car showrooms with Volvo, Arnold Clark and McKinnon Autos in Mount Vernon.Carmyle has a small grocer,a small foodmarket,a sub post-office ,a butcher ,a baker and newsagent.Westburn has three small shops and a Chinese Take Away.Food would be purchased from one of the supermarkets such as Asda in Cambuslang or Blantyre .There are flourishing smaller shops for everyday needs in Tollcross, Uddingston and Cambuslang.Freezers have made bulk buying popular. Clothes are purchased from the big stores in Glasgow and Hamilton such as Marks and Spencer and Frasers.There is a trading estate at Birkinshaw for furniture and carpets.
